name: gnotifier
author: Michal Kosciesza <michal@mkiol.net>
description: GNotifier integrates Firefox/Thunderbird's notifications with the native notification system. It supports most Linux desktops and Windows 8.

preferences.name: downloadCompleteAlert
preferences.title: Download complete notification
preferences.description: 'Downloads Complete' notification will be shown everytime when downloading is finished.

preferences.name: clickOption
preferences.title: Default click action
preferences.description: Defines action on click for download complete notification. If your notification system supports buttons, this parameter defines which button is first.

preferences.name: simpleNewMail
preferences.title: Simple New mail notification
preferences.description: New mail notification will not contain details like subject or sender address.

preferences.name: enableRSS
preferences.title: Notifications for RSS feeds
preferences.description: Notifications for new RSS feed items will be displayed.

preferences.name: notifyIcon
preferences.title: Notification Icon
preferences.description: Defines Icon used in notifications. For example: 'firefox', 'web-browser' or 'iceweasel'. If value is set to 'default' then icon will be set based on system name.
